reviews.review: The one and only classic mofugga of a game.

I first discovered Counter-Strike 1.6 back in 2000 - I was hooked for life.  Even though it was hard work, and I sucked for quite a while, I found it extremely addictive. Then in 2004 Valve released what I think is the greatest FPS game of all time, Counter-Strike: Source.

And although CS:S looks a quite a lot better than the its predecessor CS 1.6, at its core it is still the same game.

12 years, and nearly 5000 hours later all I can say is if you are a PC gamer and you like FPS's or multiplayer gaming then why haven’t you bought this yet??
Ahh, CSS, so many memories, if you don't buy this amazing, fun-filled,-memory envoking game, a baby turtle eats his own penis

Best game i've ever played.
Been playing for years, clocked over 1000 hours.

Incredible replay value with dozens of mods, and diffrent game modes.

10/10

★★★★
Mejor juego online de la historia. Muchos mapas, muchos servidores... una tecnología gráfica que sigue haciendolo mucho mejor gráficamente que la mayoria de juegos que sacan ahora...
El mejor juego al que he jugado nunca. Te enganchas desde el principio, te pasan multitud de cosas, el inmenso mundo del CS... espectacular. 
Nunca me canso y eso que llevo años jugandolo.
El juego es genial....
★★★★

Half-LifeのMODとして始まり、ESportsというジャンルを作ったゲームの一つともいえるCounter-Strike。
そのSourceエンジンへの移植として、2004年にValveからリリースされたのがCounter-Strike:Source（以下CS:S）です。
Counter-Strikeらしいストイックなゲームプレイをそのままに保ちつつも、当時として十分に美麗なグラフィックを備えたCS:Sはコミュニティに大きく受け入れられ、
一時は対戦FPSゲームの定番といえるほどのプレイ人口を誇りました。
10年ほど前までは僕もフレンドとワイワイbotを撃ったり、撃ち合ったりして非常に楽しんでいました。
現在はCS:GOのリリースや、バトルロイヤルゲームが市場を席巻していることもあって、
非常に人口が少なくなっています。したがって、基本的に対戦オンリーのこのゲームを買う理由もないと思われるかもしれません。しかし、CS:Sを買う理由がまだ一つあります。

[b]Garry's MODでマウントできること[/b]です。
NPCや武器、プロップやマップがどれも汎用性の高いものばかりで、Garry's MODの遊び方を大きく広げてくれます。GMODでシーンを色々作って遊ぶならCS:Sは必須とも言えるかもしれません。
価格も安いですし、もし遊んでくれるフレンドがいるなら本体を今遊んでも十分楽しいと思います。（現在の野良サーバーの事情を存じ上げませんが、ひょっとすると人がいるサーバーもあるかも）
GMODでマウントするためだけでも、購入して損はないです。

Expansion pack for gmod that costs too much.

A classic, must try for all FPS players.
It is still the most fun you can have with some bots and a few mods! Also still a very fun game in-itself. Still hasent been topped in my mind!

If for some reason you do not know counterstrike then either you have a very young mom and should send her my way or you have been living under a rock for the past few years. Cs put fps multiplayer on the map and to this day it still holds up against all the other fps shooters on the market. Cs is not about the pray and spray attitude since that will only get you killed but about control and real skill.

It might seem a bit dull compared to the newer games but give it some time and there is a good change it grows on you. Now there is a eternal debate going on either to play cs 1.6 (which is the halflife mod that started it all) or the cs:source version wich is cs with enhanched graphics. Now personally i dont see the diffrence and i was there when cs first came out so its not because i jumped on source after only playing the orginal for a short time.

Either way, if your a fan of fps games and like competitive gameplay and never played cs.... Then what are you still doing here...

*** Edit ***

The review part above was written on 9 Jul, 2011 so many years after its release but it was before CSGO hit the scene. Even though I still stand by the review of CSS being alot of fun. The competive scene never liked source since it was released and many stayed on the old cs 1.6 for their competive needs. I myself was there when the orginal CS was released and found myself also competing in clan matches and what not. Pro gaming excisted but it was not even close to what it is today. After playing CS since its inception CSS hit the scene and compared to CS it drew in a much larger casual crowd and since I kinda wanted to just play for fun with friends on our own server at this point we all made the swap and we had a blast on CSS for years.

CSS is now a shadow of its former self, the competive side jumped on CSGO and 5vs5 matches are now the standard. Gone are the days of servers that had their own community's and hilarious chats while waiting for everybody to die. Even the grandad CS 1.6 has more players online then CSS as of right now. So just a fair warning to anybody getting it in this day and age... The game its population is shrinking and will not fuel your competive side, you will find some hilarious servers and some of the older generations playing it.

I've played this game since 1.5, what I can say...
One of the best game of the genre...
Lots of good memories playing this game...

worthy of all my cents.
if you like shooters that focus on team work this is the game for you

Counter-Strike (shortened sometimes to CS) is a tactical first-person shooter video game developed by Valve Corporation which originated from a Half-Life modification by Minh "Gooseman" Le and Jess "Cliffe" Cliffe. The game has been expanded into a series since its original release, which currently includes Counter-Strike: Condition Zero, Counter-Strike: Source, Counter-Strike: Anthology and Counter-Strike on Xbox. Counter-Strike pits a team of counter-terrorists against a team of terrorists in a series of rounds. Each round is won by either completing the mission objective or eliminating the opposing force.
Classic gameplay, makes this the grandady of all modern online fps's and still hard to beat. A must play for all serious shooter fans.
This game rocks and gave me Months of fun!
